sections.title: Our Story
sections.content: Sparkle Clean was founded in 2016 by Maria Santos, a busy mom who couldn't find a cleaning service she could trust with her home and kids. She built the company she wished existed: reliable, thorough, and using only safe, eco-friendly products. Today, we clean over 500 homes monthly across Seattle.

hero.headline: Book Your Clean
